title: KPIT Tech jumps after Q4 PAT rises 13% QoQ to Rs 79 cr - Business Standard
content: KPIT Tech jumps after Q4 PAT rises 13% QoQ to Rs 79 cr  Business Standard
description: KPIT Technologies surged 11.29% to Rs 578.20 after the company's consolidated net profit rose 12.66% to Rs 78.87 crore on 4.72% increase in revenues to Rs 651.76 crore in Q4 March 2022 over Q3 December 2021.
